content.raw:
I’ve made the above changes, and am merging. 

I’ll file a separate issue that there isn’t a docstring listing the various supported options. Many devices don’t have docstrings, but since this one doesn’t have separate args and kwargs for its options \(they all live in the \`camera\_attributes\` dict\), it’s even more undocumented than them.

Thanks Paco, and to all contributors and testers.
content.html:
I’ve made the above changes, and am merging.

I’ll file a separate issue that there isn’t a docstring listing the various supported options. Many devices don’t have docstrings, but since this one doesn’t have separate args and kwargs for its options (they all live in the `camera_attributes` dict), it’s even more undocumented than them.

Thanks Paco, and to all contributors and testers.
